name: Terrain Project (Aiden)
description:
Terrain Project.

This is a pretty small project, made by me (Aiden Demeulenaere).
The meaning of this project is to experience some good landscape while at home!

This is currently a prototype version and this is not the final look of this game / project. Lots of more features are planned to be added soon. Including new maps, buildings & trees. Aswell as new animations, third person mode and much more.

V0.1 Is coming soon. (V0.05's visuals will look different than the screenshots / pictures of V0.1)

Made By Aiden Demeulenaere.
